content.webTitle: West Indies weddings still top spot for Brits

fields.headline: West Indies weddings still top spot for Brits
fields.bodyText: It was the perfect romantic picture. Renee Zellweger marrying Kenny Chesney on a palm-fringed beach. Now, it seems, it's the dream we all want, with West Indian weddings still the favourite with Britons wanting to tie the knot overseas. St Lucia is top, followed by Barbados, a survey from American Express Travel shows. Mauritius, which was third, came first for choice of honeymoon. Sri Lanka has recovered well from the 2004 tsunami, coming in at nine in the wedding and honeymoon top 10. Couples considered Las Vegas best value for a wedding.
